column5: I've tried to change my avatar . . .   it shows the changed avatar, but the old one still comes up?
I think the double Skunks are very fitting for you Steve!  I've had that problem before, keep futzin' with it and you'll get it!
I gave up trying to add one
I had the same problem. That's why that fuzzy faced old fart keeps showing up instead of the only fish I've ever caught.  JF
